user.description:
Set up Transport NSW to get real-time departure information.

To get a free API key:
1. Go to [Transport NSW Open Data](https://opendata.transport.nsw.gov.au/)
2. Register an account
3. Create a new application
4. Add the 'Trip Planner APIs' to your application

After setup, you can add individual stops as subentries.
